Chapter 2 Model Species 2.1 Data 2.2 Individual fixed 2.3 Individual random 2.4 Species fixed 2.5 Species random 2.6 Comparisons

Chapter 2 Model Species In this chapter we looked for the best model to integrate species base on quality of fit, cross-validation (LOO), prediction (RMSEP), and elapsed time. 2.1 Data 2.2 Individual fixed Using time \(t\) since recruitment (DBH=10cm) for each individual tree \(i\): \[ DBH_{t,i} \sim \mathcal N (10 + gmax_i \times \sum _{y=1|DBH_{t=0}} ^{y=t} exp(-\frac12.[\frac{log(\frac{DBH_{t,i}}{100.Dopt_i})}{Ks_i}]^2)), \sigma)\] 2.3 Individual random Using time \(t\) since recruitment (DBH=10cm) for each individual tree \(i\) in species \(s\): \[ DBH_{t,i,s} \sim \mathcal N (10 + gmax_i \times \sum _{y=1|DBH_{t=0}} ^{y=t} exp(-\frac12.[\frac{log(\frac{DBH_{t,i}}{100.Dopt_i})}{Ks_i}]^2)), \sigma) \\| Dopt_i \sim \mathcal N(Dopt_s,\sigma_D), Ks_i \sim \mathcal N(Ks_s,\sigma_K) \] 2.4 Species fixed Using time \(t\) since recruitment (DBH=10cm) for each individual tree \(i\) in species \(s\): \[ DBH_{t,i,s} \sim \mathcal N (10 + gmax_i \times \sum _{y=1|DBH_{t=0}} ^{y=t} exp(-\frac12.[\frac{log(\frac{DBH_{t,i}}{100.Dopt_s})}{Ks_s}]^2)), \sigma)\] 2.5 Species random Using time \(t\) since recruitment (DBH=10cm) for each individual tree \(i\) in species \(s\): \[ DBH_{t,i,s} \sim \mathcal N (10 + gmax_i \times \sum _{y=1|DBH_{t=0}} ^{y=t} exp(-\frac12.[\frac{log(\frac{DBH_{t,i}}{100.Dopt_s})}{Ks_s}]^2)), \sigma) \\| Dopt_i \sim \mathcal N(Dopt,\sigma_K), Ks \sim \mathcal N(Ks_s,\sigma_D) \] 2.6 Comparisons elpd_diff se_diff elpd_loo se_elpd_loo p_loo se_p_loo looic se_looic Individual random 0.000000 0.000000 -511.3851 66.12526 141.06429 19.340438 1022.770 132.25052 Individual fixed -8.138396 8.967316 -519.5235 63.32304 144.10479 17.511319 1039.047 126.64607 Species random -601.917286 50.741055 -1113.3024 38.22549 91.71500 8.904312 2226.605 76.45097 Species fixed -619.934641 51.696773 -1131.3198 37.95275 89.35234 8.624910 2262.640 75.90549
